item.title: Feeback of European CyberSecurity Challenge 2018 final CTF
item.author: Maki
item.description: Introduction In this article, I’ll share the whole journey that lead me to this event, not just the CTF in itself. It is a totally subjective point of view, so the “jump to section” tool might come in handy if some parts seem useless to you. First of all, I’ll start by catching up on the “Nuit du Hack” event, where it all started for some of the members of the Apéri’Kube, Hexpresso and Inshall’hack teams.

item.title: Feeback of Black Hat Europe 2017
item.author: Maki
